shortdesc.ph: Sets the number of meters corresponding to each unit of distance in the game engine.

section.p: In Agora's spatial audio algorithm, distance is measured in meters, while the unit of distance in the game engine is customizable. By default, the SDK converts each unit of distance in the game engine to 1 meter. You can call the method to convert the unit of distance in the game engine to a specified number of meters.

plentry.pd: The number of meters corresponding to each unit of distance in the game engine. The value must be greater than 0.00. The default value is 1.00. For example, setting unit to 2.00 means each unit of distance in the game engine equals 2 meters. The larger the value, the faster the sound fades as the remote user moves away from the local user.
